instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3462A: What is 820-3462A? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: macbook <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3462A</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> turn on and off
threads.message:
hi. I have this macbook retina 2012. the problem is that it restarts when the apple logo is loading. I disconnected everything on the mainboard and it still reboots. Before this, the macbook would shut down because it had the tunderbold port shorted (bent the pins).
the Hard drive does not recognize it either.

threads.title: macbook <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3462A</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> turn on and off
threads.message:
Try to clean ME region first.
Internal drive is APFS formated?
